news_header: An American Airlines flight collided mid-air with a military helicopter in Washington DC, leading to a search and rescue operation.
news_text: A search and rescue operation is ongoing after an American Airlines flight with 60 passengers collided with a military helicopter in Washington DC, both crashing into the Potomac River. Emergency services are facing extremely rough conditions. The jet was coming from Wichita, Kansas, and the helicopter had three US Army soldiers on board. Witnesses reported seeing what they thought were shooting stars before realizing the severity of the situation.
